key_verses.author: Guru Nanak Dev
key_verses.gurmukhi: ੴ ਸਤਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਕਰਤਾ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਨਿਰਭਉ ਨਿਰਵੈਰੁ ਅਕਾਲ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਅਜੂਨੀ ਸੈਭੰ ਗੁਰ ਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ॥
key_verses.transliteration: ik-oankaar sat naam kartaa purakh nirbho nirvair akaal moorat ajoonee saibhang gur prasaad ||
key_verses.translation: One Universal Creator God. Truth Is The Name. Creative Being Personified. No Fear. No Hatred. Image Of The Undying. Beyond Birth. Self-Existent. By Guru's Grace.

life_applications.identity_crisis: Remember your connection to the One Creator
life_applications.fear_anxiety: The Divine has no fear - neither should you
life_applications.hatred_anger: Divine nature is beyond hatred - cultivate that same peace

key_verses.author: Guru Nanak Dev
key_verses.gurmukhi: ਕਰਮੀ ਆਵੈ ਕਪੜਾ ਨਦਰੀ ਮੋਖੁ ਦੁਆਰੁ ॥
key_verses.transliteration: karmee aavai kaparhaa nadaree mokh du-aar ||
key_verses.translation: Through your actions comes your livelihood, and through His Grace, the door of liberation.

life_applications.career_stress: Focus on righteous action, not just results
life_applications.work_ethics: Your work is your karma - do it with integrity
life_applications.unemployment: Trust that honest effort brings sustenance

kathakar_references.pinderpal_singh: Work becomes worship when done with right intention and integrity

key_verses.author: Guru Arjan Dev
key_verses.translation: The Name is the medicine for all ailments.

life_applications.anxiety_depression: Naam simran heals mental and emotional wounds
life_applications.addiction: Divine Name provides strength to overcome dependencies

practical_guidance: Start day with 15 minutes of 'Waheguru' repetition
During illness, combine medical treatment with spiritual practice
Use breath awareness with naam for anxiety relief

key_verses.author: Guru Arjan Dev
key_verses.gurmukhi: ਨਾਨਕ ਚਿੰਤਾ ਮਤਿ ਕਰਹੁ ਚਿੰਤਾ ਤਿਸ ਹੀ ਹੇਇ ॥
key_verses.transliteration: naanak chintaa mat karahu chintaa tis hee hay-i ||
key_verses.translation: O Nanak, don't worry; worry belongs to Him alone.

life_applications.work_pressure: Do your best, leave results to Divine will
life_applications.family_problems: Take action where possible, surrender what you can't control
life_applications.health_concerns: Worry doesn't help healing - trust and positive action do

life_applications.family_conflicts: Service and respect can heal family tensions
life_applications.elder_care: Caring for aging parents is spiritual practice
life_applications.cultural_balance: Honor parents while maintaining personal growth
